title: userinfo
description: View information about a user.
---

View information about a user.

## Usage

```sh
;userinfo [user]
```

## Examples

```sh
# view information about you
;userinfo
# view information about @ToastedToast
;userinfo @ToastedToast
```

## Aliases

- whois
